name: zman-in
title: Zman.in
description: Easily share a time with friends in other timezones. Be aligned. Same team.
author: schniz

commands.name: share-time
commands.title: Share Time
commands.description: Easily share a time with friends in other timezones. Be aligned. Same team.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
